review: Works pretty good the remote and navigation are easier then I expected. The one bad thing is the picture resizing doesn't allow me to size the picture correctly you can only adjust bigger or smaller not left to right or up and down. So I either have a little bit of unused screen or I lose just a little bit of the image? It is close but this could be fixed if I was able to adjust left right and up down like my Google tv
